places_with_reviews.name: Harela Inn Luxury Hotel Restaurant North & South Indian
address: Harela Inn, Kshetrapal, Bhimtala, Badrinath Highway, Chamoli Gopeshwar, Uttarakhand 246424, India

reviews.text:
Rooms were okay but the commode seat was found broken and the main door was not latchable. But the service was horrendous.
The management replied to my initial review, which I totally disagree with. Food was not available as standard. It was made to order that too with full of reluctance.  Despite asking they said as per my wish,  the ordered food was prepared after occupancy of the table.
If according to the reply that's the best then I am sorry it's not of the quality I deserve after paying hefty to the tour operators

We stayed here for a night on our way to Badrinath on 27th October, 2023. The rooms were spacious and clean. Bathroom had 24*7 hot water. Resturant was good and prepared breakfast for us at 6am. Great stay, happy to recommend.

Great location, courteous and polite staff, good rooms, yummy meals - few things which will come to your mind if you have stayed here. It's a beautifully maintained property. Special mention of the chef who made each meal so yummy that it was just an icing on the cake

I am checking out of this hotel today. I booked this hotel for two days and had an amazing experience. The room, service and behaviour of staff was of 5 star quality. They served yummy food with generous quantity. They provided proper food for my driver too. All in all its an amazing hotel in a budget price. Anyone visiting Badrinath I recommend not book a hotel in Badrinath as people over there are quite unfriendly. So, it's better to come down to Harela Inn same day after darshan of Shri Badrivishal.
very nice food, clean & staff is too good.

reviews.text: This hotel is just 3kms away from thw city and rooms are good as per the price. You can stay here.

It's a good stayover, perfect view, some cleanliness issue is there but quality of service and food overcomes it, u can use all out to keep insects away at night provided by hotel, we asked local veggie cooking and we were provided with pahadi bhindi. Perfect pics were taken by us.
Affordable and clean rooms near Rudrnath trekking start point in Sagar. It's a good option for those who wants to visit rudranth-4th Kedar. Food is basic but healthy and tasty.

Hotel located on Gopeswar - Mondal road, just few minutes away from Rudranath gate beside lovely fountain. Rooms has lovely scenic beauty of vally. Rooms has got primary facilities with gyser. Hospitality of owner is very good.
Large and spacious room. No wardrobe. Geyser water is hot. No tower or soap in the bathroom. Comfortable beds. Restaurant has a limited range of food, but service is quick and the food is good.
